Republican China committee chairman Gallagher retiring from US CongressU.S. Representative Mike Gallagher, who chairs the House select committee on competition with China, said on Saturday he will not run for re-election, four days after he was one of only four House Republicans to buck party leadership and vote against impeaching President Joe Biden's top border official. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 20:17:22 GMT YZIXCJHTZRMUHI4LUPHL4JWX3Q https://www.reuters.com/world/us/republican-china-committee-chairman-gallagher-retiring-us-congress-2024-02-10/Patricia Zengerle世界美国
Beijing cancels Argentina friendly as Messi fallout continuesArgentina's friendly against Ivory Coast, scheduled to be held in Beijing in March, has been cancelled, the Chinese city's football association said on Saturday, following a backlash against Lionel Messi's failure to play in a match in Hong Kong. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 14:35:26 GMT T2TJRJIFJ5PPNH4MSRV6E2MJHA https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/beijing-cancels-argentina-friend-messi-fallout-continues-2024-02-10/Reuters运动的足球
JSW Group to set up nearly $5 billion in EV projects in eastern IndiaIndia's JSW Group will set up electric vehicles and battery manufacturing projects in the country's eastern state of Odisha at a cost of 400 billion rupees ($4.82 billion). Sat, 10 Feb 2024 07:21:03 GMT EP5EJVZUNVPY5FDXX2JPFMMA44 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/jsw-group-set-up-nearly-5-bln-ev-projects-eastern-india-2024-02-10/Reuters世界印度
Taiwan reports Chinese balloons at start of New Year holidayTaiwan's defence ministry said on Saturday it had detected eight Chinese balloons crossing the Taiwan Strait in the previous 24 hours, two of which flew across the island, in an uptick of activity at the start of the Lunar New Year holiday. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 01:12:13 GMT LTQXVQOS6BL2PJKNPUFAEG2NFI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-reports-eight-chinese-balloons-crossing-taiwan-strait-2024-02-10/Reuters世界亚太地区
Ukraine aid bill inches forward in US SenateThe U.S. Senate on Friday edged closer to passing a bill that includes $95.34 billion in aid for Ukraine, Israel and Taiwan, but faces an uncertain path to becoming law due to Republican opposition in both chambers of Congress. Sat, 10 Feb 2024 01:02:26 GMT第333章https://www.reuters.com/world/us/ukraine-aid-bill-inches-forward-us-senate-2024-02-10/David Morgan世界美国
TikTok loses court fight to suspend EU gatekeeper statusByteDance's TikTok has lost its bid to suspend its designation as a gatekeeper, which makes it subject to onerous obligations under EU rules, after Europe's second top court dismissed its request because it failed to show the urgency for such a move. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 15:58:19 GMT JYIZ5JHXUFMGZI3U25BMNDWM2E https://www.reuters.com/technology/eu-court-dismisses-bytedances-appeal-against-gatekeeper-status-2024-02-09/Bart Meijer, Foo Yun Chee技术
Barron takes lead in Qatar with blistering back nineHaydn Barron hit five birdies on the back nine to card a five-under-par 67 and take a two-shot lead after the second round of the Qatar Masters on Friday. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 15:57:20 GMT QR3YIRTMIVMEFG5C2MLP2TN4HE https://www.reuters.com/sports/golf/barron-takes-lead-qatar-with-blistering-back-nine-2024-02-09/Reuters运动的高尔夫球
China South City flags potential default on Oct 2024 notes paymentProperty developer China South City Holdings said on Friday it is likely to default on the mandatory redemption payment due on Feb. 9 for its 9% Senior Notes due October 2024, citing depressed sales and cash flow. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 15:25:36 GMT D5J75BTJYZJSTHDJPFVL7T6OAA https://www.reuters.com/business/china-south-city-flags-pottial-default-oct-2024-notes- payment-2024-02-09/Reuters商业
BASF to exit joint ventures in China's Xinjiang amid rights record scrutinyBASF said on Friday that it would sell its stakes in two joint ventures in the Chinese region of Xinjiang, where human rights groups have documented abuses including forced labour in detention camps. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 13:43:58 GMT LEKKJRK6KBNEW5OXQGERH3Q555Y https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/society-equity/basf-sell-two-jvs-xinjian-china-2024-02-09/Ludwig Burger可持续发展社会与公平
Investors dumped U.S. shares, bought China in week to Wednesday - BofAInvestors dumped U.S. and real estate shares and bought Chinese stocks in the week to Wednesday, a report from Bank of America citing data from EPFR said on Friday, saying the China flows were likely driven by Chinese public funds. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 12:25:06 GMT 2RPQLEWRSAATBVRLHI https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-market-flows-bofa-update-1-2024-02-09/Reuters市场ETF
Philippines says joint exercises held with U.S. in S. China SeaThe Philippines and the United States conducted joint maritime exercises in the South China Sea on Friday, the Philippine military said, the latest round of drills underlining ongoing expansion of their defence ties. Fri, 09 Feb 2024 11:20:48 GMT 4GGJZFVJGFPMLA6YZQ4YPPODXQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-says-joint-exercises-successful-with-us-china-sea-2024-02-09/Reuters世界亚太地区
